About.title: About Me
About.p1: As an engineer, I am passionate about solving large-scale problems through principled engineering and building full-stack systems that scale to millions. My philosophy is rooted in creating robust, efficient, and maintainable software. I thrive in agile team environments, contributing to high-performance systems and handling petabyte-scale data.
About.p2: I am currently pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at KL University, where I maintain a CGPA of 9.23/10. My academic foundation equips me with strong problem-solving and analytical skills, while my hands-on experiences allow me to bridge theory with practice.
About.p3: Previously, I worked as a DevOps Intern at Next CX, where I gained practical experience in cloud technologies, automation, and deployment pipelines. This role allowed me to strengthen my understanding of CI/CD, containerization, and scalable infrastructure management.
About.p4: Beyond my technical journey, I am also a 3× National Powerlifting Gold Medalist. The resilience and discipline I’ve developed through powerlifting directly translate into my professional life—teaching me perseverance, focus, and the ability to push beyond limits.
